hero.title: Helping You Scale Smarter While Maximizing ROI
hero.description: Unlock the expertise of 5 experienced professionals for the price of 1! Stop relying on interns—enroll in AR Solutions’ Business Development & Ecommerce Retainer Plan and get hands-on support from a team of experts. Enjoy the flexibility to cancel anytime while benefiting from top-tier guidance to grow your business smarter and faster.
hero.imageAlt: Nuxt logo and title on abstract background

features.title: Fueling Growth, Delivering Results
features.description: Your Partner for Real Business Impact - Enabling brands to grow with performance-driven digital marketing and smart business solutions

items.title: Digital Marketing & Web Development
items.description: Full-stack digital solutions including custom website development (WordPress, Shopify, WooCommerce), SEO, paid ads, performance marketing, and landing page optimization to increase visibility and conversions.

items.title: Social Media Strategy & Management
items.description: Strategic planning and hands-on execution for platforms like Instagram, LinkedIn, and Facebook. Includes content creation, visual design, calendar planning, community engagement, and analytics tracking.

items.title: Lead Generation & Business Prospecting
items.description: Data-driven B2B and B2C lead generation campaigns using advanced tools and platforms. We help build CRM systems, set up outreach workflows, and create targeted prospecting campaigns to boost your sales pipeline.

items.title: Branding, Identity & Design
items.description: End-to-end brand development including logo creation, company profile design, pitch decks, marketing collaterals, and visual brand guidelines. We ensure your brand is aligned, recognizable, and ready for scale.

items.title: Startup Growth & Business Development
items.description: Special support for startups and emerging brands through growth consulting, automation workflows, sales funnels, investor decks, go-to-market strategy, and customer acquisition planning.

items.title: Offline Marketing & Local Visibility
items.description: Execution of local marketing campaigns including pamphlet distribution, vehicle branding, outdoor flex boards, and strategic offline placements to support hyperlocal visibility and integrated marketing reach.

testimonials.title: What Our Users Are Saying
testimonials.description: Hear from our clients about their experiences working with Nuxt and Netlify.

cta.title: Start Building with Nuxt & Netlify
cta.description: Let your next project be smarter, faster, and effortlessly deployable.
